means: 令人恐惧的，可怕的，恐怖的

sentence.Network_en: The annual slaughter of wildlife in Italy is horrific.
sentence.Network_cn: 在意大利，每年大量捕杀野生动物的现象令人震惊。

sentence.Network_en: The film showed the most horrific murder scenes.
sentence.Network_cn: 那部影片有极恐怖的谋杀场面.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(H3) ... horridly 可怕地 horrific 可怖的 horrified 惊悸的.
779天与时并进 HIGHWAY HORROR 标题怎译... ... double decker bus 双层巴士, horrific 可怖, traffic accident 交通意外.
and hurling objects at horrific speeds straight up or the side ., 并且以骇人的速度将各种物体直接甩到空中或旁边.
euphemistically 委婉地horrific 令人恐惧的travesty 拙劣的模仿作品

list.abs: Caleb , an ex-marine , suffers from horrific nightmares . he jumps from one job and city to the next , searching for answers his problems .凯莱布遭受着可怕的恶梦，他辞去工作，搬到另一个城市，试图寻找答案。
People have been enslaved and abused in countless horrific ways ., 用无数残酷的方式被用于对付人民 , 人民被奴役和虐待.

only later did she begin to display the symptoms of Huntington's Disease , an inherited brain disorder that produces horrific delusions and uncontrolled movements .之后她开始表现出亨廷顿舞蹈病的症状，这种病是一种遗传性大脑紊乱，会使病人产生可怕的幻觉和无法控制自己的行为。
They also tend toto some horrific data declarations ., 他们还往往导致一些可怕的数据宣告.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin horrificus, from horrere 'tremble, shudder' (see horrid)

entry.tran: （攻击、事故、伤势等）令人震惊的，极其可怕的，十分严重的
entry.def: If you describe a physical attack, accident, or injury as horrific, you mean that it is very bad, so that people are shocked when they see it or think about it.

example.ex: I have never seen such horrific injuries...
example.tran: 我从来没有见过如此严重的伤势。

entry.def: If you describe something as horrific, you mean that it is so big that it is extremely unpleasant.

example.ex: ...piling up horrific extra amounts of money on top of your original debt.
example.tran: 在你原来债务的基础上又高筑债台

means.word_mean: 1. grossly offensive to decency or morality; causing horror;
2. causing fear or dread or terror;

sentences.sentence: "a career or vengeance so direful that London was shocked"
"polio is no longer the dreaded disease it once was"

pac和平+ific产生……的→adj.和平的 n.太平洋
scient有知识的+ific产生……的→adj.科学上的
sopor睡觉+ific产生……的→adj.催眠的 n.安眠药
terr恐,怕+ific产生……的→带来可怕→好到让人可怕的地步→极好的
